reviews.author: Customer 1

reviews.text: The salad selection in the lunch buffet is excellent, and the portion sizes are surprisingly large. You definitely won't leave hungry.
reviews.author: Customer 2

about.title: Our Story
about.p1: Käskynkkä – at once modern and traditional, relaxed and stylish. A restaurant and social venue known for its delicious food in the Jynkkä district of Kuopio.
about.p2: Good food is built on experience and high-quality ingredients. You can enjoy delicious food from us both at lunchtime and from our À La Carte menu in generous portions. Our catering service, on the other hand, ensures a successful celebration or other event.
about.p3: But what would good food be without the right atmosphere? A cozy feeling is created by our modern facilities and professional, helpful staff.

catering.title: Planning a Party?
catering.description: Our catering service ensures a successful celebration or other event. Customized menus, professional service and cozy facilities – let us make your day memorable.
